dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED SalesTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, SalesTurnovers.SecondPeriod AS SecondPeriod, SalesTurnovers.MinutePeriod AS MinutePeriod, SalesTurnovers.HourPeriod AS HourPeriod, SalesTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, SalesTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, SalesTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod AS TenDaysPeriod, SalesTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, SalesTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, SalesTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod AS HalfYearPeriod, SalesTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, SalesTurnovers.Products AS Products, SalesTurnovers.Characteristic AS Characteristic, SalesTurnovers.Batch AS Batch, SalesTurnovers.Document AS Document, SalesTurnovers.VATRate AS VATRate, SalesTurnovers.Company AS Company, SalesTurnovers.SalesOrder AS SalesOrder, SalesTurnovers.Document.Counterparty AS Counterparty, CASE WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.ExpenseReport THEN VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef) WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.SalesOrder THEN SalesTurnovers.Document.SalesStructuralUnit ELSE SalesTurnovers.Document.Department END AS Department, CASE WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.SalesOrder THEN SalesTurnovers.Document.StructuralUnitReserve ELSE SalesTurnovers.Document.StructuralUnit END AS Warehouse, ProductsRef.MeasurementUnit AS ProductsMeasurementUnit, SalesTurnovers.Responsible AS Responsible, SalesTurnovers.SalesRep AS SalesRep, SalesTurnovers.QuantityTurnover AS Quantity, SalesTurnovers.AmountTurnover + SalesTurnovers.VATAmountTurnover AS Amount, SalesTurnovers.VATAmountTurnover AS VATAmount, SalesTurnovers.AmountTurnover AS AmountWithoutVAT, SalesTurnovers.CostTurnover AS Cost, ProductsRef.ProductsCategory AS ProductsCategory FROM AccumulationRegister.Sales.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS SalesTurnovers LEFT JOIN Catalog.Products AS ProductsRef ON SalesTurnovers.Products = ProductsRef.Ref

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN IsNull(AmountWithoutVAT, 0) <> 0 THEN AmountWithoutVAT - IsNull(Cost, 0) / AmountWithoutVAT ELSE 0 END * 100

totalField.expression: CASE when SUM(AmountWithoutVAT) <> 0 Then (SUM(AmountWithoutVAT)- Sum(Cost) ) * 100 / SUM(AmountWithoutVAT) ELSE "-" END

parameter.dcsat:name: DynamicPeriod
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Day) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Week) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.TenDays) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Month) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MMM yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Quarter) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'q ""app."" yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.HalfYear) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MM.yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Year) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'yyyy'") END
